name: Heart of Wessex Day Ranger (Bristol/Swindon-Weymouth)
description:
HEART OF WESSEX DAY RANGER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day within the Bristol, Swindon and Weymouth triangle and includes Pilning, Yate, Parson Street, Pewsey and the Severn Beach 
      branch.
